message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for it. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go above that price.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your offer, I can't go as low as $9,000. Would you consider $10,500?

I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I'm getting close to my limit, but I'd love to find a mutually agreeable price.
